title: The future of secure messaging: Why decentralization matters more than ever
contentSnippet: Decentralized messengers shift security beyond encryption by reducing metadata, limiting data requests and preparing for post-quantum threats.

title: Coinbase Reopens India Signups, Targets Fiat On-Ramp in 2026 After Two-Year Freeze
contentSnippet: Coinbase halted services entirely in 2023, off-boarded millions of Indian users and shuttered local access while reassessing regulatory exposure.

title: トランプ大統領支援者所有の米Monet Bank、仮想通貨サービス事業に参入
contentSnippet: トランプ大統領支援者アンディ・ビール氏所有のモネ銀行が仮想通貨特化型金融サービスに参入する。トランプ政権下での規制緩和により、エレボール銀行やN3XTなど仮想通貨対応銀行が相次いで誕生する中、資産60億ドルの小規模地域銀行がデジタル資産の保管・融資を提供開始する。

title: Ethereum’s first ZK-rollup, ZKsync Lite, to be retired in 2026
contentSnippet: ZKsync says the first Ethereum zero-knowledge rollup blockchain will have an “orderly sunset” next year, as it has served its purpose.

title: Bitcoin bulls must defend key level to avoid $76K, analysts say
contentSnippet: Bitcoin is holding a critical Fibonacci support level, but analysts warned that a break could trigger losses down to April lows of $76,000.

title: ETH, ADA, XRP Lead Gains as Bitcoin Edges Higher on Fed Rate Cut Expectations
contentSnippet: Asian equities opened the week slightly higher ahead of a heavy run of central bank decisions, including a Federal Reserve meeting where markets have largely priced in a 25-basis-point rate cut.

title: Philippines’ fastest-growing digital bank rolls out crypto services
contentSnippet: The digital bank now offers BTC, ETH, SOL and more via a secure app integration with US fintech firm Alpaca.

title: Robinhood Eyes Indonesia Market as Local Crypto Adoption Soars
contentSnippet: Robinhood is buying a local brokerage and crypto firm as the country tightens digital finance rules and remains a leading crypto market.

title: トランプ政権の国家安全保障戦略、仮想通貨に言及せず　AI・量子技術を優先
contentSnippet: トランプ政権が発表した最新の国家安全保障戦略で仮想通貨への言及がゼロ。AI・量子技術を重視する一方、「仮想通貨大統領」を公言してきた経緯との整合性をめぐり議論が起きている。

title: Buyers Step In at $2 Floor as XRP Builds on Bitcoin's Hover Above $91K
contentSnippet: Institutional demand for XRP ETFs has surpassed $1 billion, despite muted retail interest.

title: Binance Wins Full ADGM Approval for Exchange, Clearing, and Brokerage Operations
contentSnippet: Abu Dhabi’s Financial Services Regulatory Authority has granted licenses to three Binance entities covering exchange, clearing, and brokerage functions.

title: Here's How Bitcoin, Ether, XRP and Solana May Trade Today
contentSnippet: ETH mirrors BTC's counter-trend consolidation as XRP probes key $2 support and SOL remains directionless

title: Coinbase Reopens India Access, Sets 2026 Target for Cash-to-Crypto Purchases
contentSnippet: The move underscores Coinbase’s view of India as a long-term growth market, despite policy uncertainty in the near term.

title: ‘Grow up... We debank Democrats, we debank Republicans:’ JPMorgan CEO
contentSnippet: It was only last month when Jack Mallers, CEO of Bitcoin payments company Strike, accused JPMorgan of closing his personal accounts without explanation.

title: Bitcoin Edges Back Above $91,000 as Traders Brace for Fed Decision and Jobs Data
contentSnippet: Bitcoin is edging higher ahead of the Fed’s final rate decision and a key jobs report, extending its rebound as thin liquidity persists.

title: Robinhood set to enter Indonesia, targeting 17M crypto traders
contentSnippet: Robinhood acquired an Indonesian brokerage and digital asset trading firm to access a market with 17 million crypto investors.

title: Trump’s national security strategy is silent on crypto, blockchain
contentSnippet: Cryptocurrency and blockchain did not receive a mention in Donald Trump’s national security priorities, despite the president’s desire for the US to become a hub for crypto.

title: Vitalik Buterin floats gas futures on Ethereum to hedge fee spikes
contentSnippet: Buterin proposed a system akin to prediction markets for gas fees, to provide Ethereum users with a means to hedge against future network fee volatility.

title: FOMC控え不安定な展開続くビットコイン、前週末は大口の協調売りか
contentSnippet: 暗号資産（仮想通貨）市場ではビットコインが一時9万ドル割れで3.4億ドル規模の大量清算発生。クジラによる協調売りの可能性が浮上し、週末の薄い板で2000ドルの乱高下が見られた。一方でマイナー降伏を示すハッシュリボン反転で底打ちサインも。FOMC利下げ観測と円キャリー巻き戻しが市場を揺さぶる。

title: ZKsync to Retire Its Original Ethereum Rollup Next Year
contentSnippet: ZKsync is retiring its original Lite network, formalizing a shift toward ZKsync Era and the ZK Stack as activity on the legacy rollup fades.

title: ソラナDEX「ジュピター」の再担保に関する議論　「伝染リスクゼロ」主張を疑問視
contentSnippet: 仮想通貨ソラナ基盤のジュピターが「伝染リスクゼロ」と主張したことについて、競合Kaminoなどが再担保の実施を指摘し批判した。ソラナ財団プレジデントは両者に協力を呼びかけている。

title: フランスの大手銀行BPCE、仮想通貨4銘柄の取引サービス開始
contentSnippet: フランスの大手銀行BPCEが約200万人の顧客向けに仮想通貨取引サービスを開始する。ビットコインなど4銘柄が銀行アプリで売買可能になる。

title: 韓国、取引所に無過失損害賠償責任を導入へ　アップビットのハッキング事件を受け
contentSnippet: 韓国金融当局が仮想通貨取引所に無過失損害賠償責任を導入へ。アップビットの445億ウォン不正アクセス事件を受け、2段階立法で規制強化。課徴金も売上高3%まで引き上げの方針。

title: Why Tokenized Assets Can't Flourish Without Liquidity: Securitize CEO
contentSnippet: Accessibility isn’t the only factor shaping a wave of tokenized assets, according to Securitize co-founder and CEO Carlos Domingo.

title: Crypto’s other halving: Bittensor’s first 4-year cycle seen as ‘maturation’ milestone
contentSnippet: Bittensor’s first token halving is scheduled for Dec. 14, reducing TAO issuance by half as the AI-focused network adopts a Bitcoin-style fixed supply model.

title: Getting Started With Myriad
contentSnippet: Myriad's prediction market ecosystem enables you to make predictions using USDC. Here’s how to get set up and start using it.

title: Here’s what happened in crypto today
contentSnippet: Need to know what happened in crypto today? Here is the latest news on daily trends and events impacting Bitcoin price, blockchain, DeFi, NFTs, Web3 and crypto regulation.

title: Buy the Bitcoin Dip? Why Ric Edelman Still Thinks Portfolios Should Hold Up to 40% Crypto
contentSnippet: Ric Edelman isn’t budging from the Bitcoin investment strategies he urged six months ago, even as BTC lingers far from record-breaking heights.

title: From Paper to Code: The Future of Tokenization with Carlos Domingo
contentSnippet: Securitize co-founder and CEO Carlos Domingo delves into the nuances of tokenization, from its potential benefits to the industry's failed experiments.

title: Trump's National Security Strategy Ignores Bitcoin And Blockchain
contentSnippet: The U.S. president's latest national security strategy focused on AI, biotech, and quantum computing.

title: Crypto Has Reinvented and Replatformed the Middle Man
contentSnippet: For those of us who want to use crypto to make the world better, we need to start calling out this behavior for what it is: short-sighted, selfish, unwelcome greed, says VeChain co-founder Sunny Lu.

title: Bitcoin’s Deep Correction Sets Stage for December Rebound, Says K33 Research
contentSnippet: K33 Research says market fear is outweighing fundamentals as bitcoin nears key levels. December could offer an entry point for bold investors.

title: Bitcoin Market Echoes Early 2022 as Onchain Stress Mounts: Glassnode
contentSnippet: Rising bitcoin supply in loss, weakening spot demand and cautious derivatives positioning were among the issues raised by the data provider in its weekly newsletter.

title: Dogecoin Activity Hits 3-Month High but DOGE Price Action Remains Range-Bound
contentSnippet: DOGE network engagement surged to 71,589 active addresses — its highest reading since September — signaling improving chain activity despite muted price performance.

title: 「ビットコインを価値の橋渡し役に」Bitcoin Japan CEO、繊維業からの大転換とAI戦略を語る
contentSnippet: 東証上場の堀田丸正から「ビットコインジャパン」へ大胆に転換したフィリップ・ロード（Phillip Lord）CEOが、CoinPost独占インタビューでビットコイン準備金戦略とAIインフラ投資の詳細を明かした。「日本の品質×米国の規模」で2030年までに500MW規模のデータセンター投資を目指す。

title: 仮想通貨取引所のキャンペーン・特典情報【2025年12月最新】
contentSnippet: 2025年12月更新：主要な暗号資産（仮想通貨）取引所が展開するキャンペーンと特典情報を徹底解説。仮想通貨取引の第一歩は、国内取引所の口座開設。初心者もトレーダーもキャンペーンや特典を駆使して、投資の機会を最大限に活用しましょう。

title: 今週の主要仮想通貨材料まとめ、イーサリアム「フサカ」実装完了やソラナスマホの独自通貨発行計画など
contentSnippet: 前週比で振り返る仮想通貨市場の最新動向。ビットコインやイーサリアム、XRP、ソラナなど主要銘柄の騰落率や注目材料を一挙紹介。市場トレンドと関連ニュースを詳しく解説する。

title: 仮想通貨取引所ステーキング利率徹底比較｜高年率銘柄・サービスの選び方
contentSnippet: 【2025年12月最新】国内主要取引所のステーキング対応銘柄と年率を一覧比較。イーサリアムやソラナなど人気コインの高利率サービスを紹介し、各取引所のメリット・デメリットや税金のポイントも解説します。

title: Crypto Holiday Gift Guide 2025
contentSnippet: At a loss for what to buy the crypto fan in your life this festive season? Look no further than Decrypt’s holiday gift guide.

title: Professor Coin: When Bitcoin Sneezes—How Crypto and Equities Caught the Same Cold
contentSnippet: Academic literature finds that during periods of economic stress, correlations and spillovers between cryptocurrencies and equities spike.
